node.name: ProGuardDT
node.shortdescription:
ProGuardDT:
Provides a forms-based editor for creating and managing ProGuard configurations directly from within Eclipse.

ProGuard is a free Java class file shrinker, optimizer, obfuscator, and preverifier. ProGuardDT supports seamless execution of ProGuard and ReTrace.

ProGuardDT is project aware: the ProGuard library dependencies list can be dynamically generated directly from an identification of the participating Eclipse projects. Closely modeled after the Swing-based ProGuardGUI configuration management tool.

Uses, and includes, ProGuard 4.5 (final)
node.body:
ProGuardDT:
Provides a forms-based editor for creating and managing ProGuard configurations directly from within Eclipse.

ProGuard is a free Java class file shrinker, optimizer, obfuscator, and preverifier. ProGuardDT supports seamless execution of ProGuard and ReTrace.

ProGuardDT is project aware: the ProGuard library dependencies list can be dynamically generated directly from an identification of the participating Eclipse projects. Closely modeled after the Swing-based ProGuardGUI configuration management tool.

Uses, and includes, ProGuard 4.5 (final)
